answers.answer: Hi Please don't worry 85% of men/boys has a curve with there penis and have no trouble at all , however if it is a problem the curve in your penis ask your Family Doctor to send you to see a Urologist there you will get all the help you need , take care

question: i've had e.d. problems for the past 7 years or so, due to anxiety, diabetes (controlled) and medication.....usually e.d. drugs had helped...about a year ago, after taking viagra my erection was different........ it seems the tip curved down......like my erection isnt straight anymore.... the best way i can explain is if i stick my forefinger out, the joint right above  fingernail is bent down......can this be nerve damage?
title: E.D.PROBLEM
